title: Can we get 3 extra Refunds for hitting level 30??
body: I think we deserve maybe 2-3 extra re rolls for hitting level 30? who agrees?

replies.body:
Personally i think they should be unlocked with level.
You start the game, there's no refunds. Then you get one every 10 levels.

This way you avoid people wasting their refunds on a 450ip champion they don't play anymore, and keep them for their actual use - taking back mistakes.
Once you get that problem solved, there's no need to ask for more refunds.

ps. Unpopular opinion, i know. Might be downvoted. It's fine, i understand.
Just one note before that: Try and remember what you refunded, the reason you did it and why do you need more refunds.
Once you did that, think about my post again.

My biggest mistake was refunding Jax because I was level 10 and I had no fucking clue how to play him, (I bought him with IP). But that doesn't matter anyway cus I have all champions now and IP means nothing xD

How about no. Fact is Riot didn't even need to offer refunds at all but they did. Really refunds are a way for Riot to avoid people complaining about "accidental" purchases. If you've gone and wasted refunds it's your own fault. That simple.

would be nice

but riot will never do it
a long time, there was no refund js

You could get some stuff refunded if you contacted support within a while. One refund only, max 3 items.
Was a bit heavy on the tickets tho, so they made it automated and for everyone.
